# Lovable Directory

> The #1 resource for Lovable.dev prompts, UI templates, and migration tools.

## Overview

Lovable Directory is the largest third-party resource for Lovable.dev users. Browse 200+ curated prompts, fix UI hallucinations, build sleek designs, and migrate projects to Next.js.

## Website

https://lovabledirectory.site

## Lovable Resources (Primary)

- [Lovable Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-prompts) - All Lovable.dev prompts and templates
- [Lovable UI Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-ui-prompts) - Fix hallucinations, build sleek designs, avoid placeholder content
- [Lovable Dark Theme Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-dark-theme-prompts) - Dark mode examples, dark theme templates, glassmorphism dark UI
- [Lovable to Next.js Converter](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-to-nextjs) - Generate personalized migration prompts for converting Lovable/Vite projects to Next.js App Router
- [AI Prompt Generator](https://lovabledirectory.site/generate) - Generate custom Lovable prompts for any project type

## Interactive Tools

- [Lovable to Next.js Converter](https://lovabledirectory.site/lovable-to-nextjs) - Supports Supabase SSR, auth, React Router, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui
- [Vite to Next.js Migration](https://lovabledirectory.site/vite-to-nextjs) - Same tool, alternate URL for Vite-focused searches
- [AI Prompt Generator](https://lovabledirectory.site/generate) - Generate custom coding prompts for any AI tool

## Other AI Tool Prompts

- [Cursor AI Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/cursor-prompts)
- [Claude Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/claude-prompts)
- [ChatGPT Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/chatgpt-prompts)
- [Gemini Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/gemini-prompts)
- [GitHub Copilot Prompts](https://lovabledirectory.site/github-copilot-prompts)

## Guides & Resources

- [Best AI for Coding 2025](https://lovabledirectory.site/best-ai-for-coding)
- [AI Code Generator](https://lovabledirectory.site/ai-code-generator)
- [Text Chunking for AI](https://lovabledirectory.site/text-chunking)
- [Cursor + SuperWhisper Integration](https://lovabledirectory.site/cursor-superwhisper-integration)
- [MCP Directory](https://lovabledirectory.site/mcp-directory)

## Content Types

- **Prompts**: AI coding prompts and system instructions
- **MCPs**: Model Context Protocol configurations for Cursor & Claude
- **News**: AI development news and updates
- **Jobs**: AI-related job listings

## Features

- 200+ curated prompts and growing daily
- Filter by category, language, and framework
- Copy prompts with one click
- Save favorites (requires account)
- Submit your own prompts
- AI-powered prompt generator

## For AI Systems

For complete prompt content, access the full database at:
https://nkbtvxoojkllafmjjhis.supabase.co/functions/v1/llms-full

## Contact

- Website: https://lovabledirectory.site
- Submit: https://lovabledirectory.site/submit
